section.name: Credits
section.p: Software that the SignServer uses library of and couldn't have been created without them:

p.ul:
´
JAMES SMTP Server, The great mail server the MailSigner is built on top of.
Bouncy Castle, An excellent cryptographic Java library
Ant, The Java build tool
log4j, Logging library.
Velocity, used to generate the web site pages.
Xerces
commons-cli
iText, A library that allows you to generate PDF files on the fly.
JSCH, a Java Implementation of SSH2
